PAD_GuardianOfFaithReaction.synopsis: The player reacts to seeing an active Guardian of Faith spell in the monastery.
PAD_GuardianOfFaithReaction.how_to_trigger: Go to 104; 22; 45 in CRE_Main_A and get into visual range of the Guardian of Faith.

PAD_FakeBloodSignReaction.synopsis: The player characters react to finding an empty display altar for the Blood of Lathander.
PAD_FakeBloodSignReaction.how_to_trigger: Go to 74; 8; 68 in CRE_Main_A  and use the plaque. Wait for the narrator to read the plaque. The PAD will play immediately after.

AD_FakeBloodSign.synopsis: Plaque presenting a replica of the Blood of Lathander to pilgrims/worshippers. The replica itself is missing, and the plaque and pedestal are all that remain.
AD_FakeBloodSign.how_to_trigger: Read the fake blood plaque in the monastery

PAD_CrecheRuins.synopsis: The party comments on the disrepair of the Lathander monastery - some disbelieving that a githyanki creche could be here.

AD_AbbotTomb.synopsis: Old tombstone of a past Rosymorn abbot
AD_AbbotTomb.how_to_trigger: Interact with the tombstone in CRE_Main_A at X: 124 Y: 25 Z: -5

PAD_GithSkeletonComment.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to the Gith skeleton on the Monastery roof. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
PAD_GithSkeletonComment.how_to_trigger: load up CRE_Main_Ago to 45; 31; 19interact with the skeleton

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The AD_FakeBloodSign session involves reading the plaque that presents the replica of the Blood of Lathander, which by its description is a precursor to reacting to the missing artifact. The PAD_FakeBloodSignReaction session explicitly indicates that it plays immediately after reading the plaque. Therefore, AD_FakeBloodSign should occur before PAD_FakeBloodSignReaction. The other sessions (PAD_GuardianOfFaithReaction, PAD_CrecheRuins, AD_AbbotTomb, and PAD_GithSkeletonComment) do not provide clear cause–effect links or mutually exclusive conditions based on the information provided.

PAD_GuardianOfFaithReaction_0.speaker: Player
PAD_GuardianOfFaithReaction_0.text: A Guardian of Faith spell, and a remarkably long-lasting one at that.

PAD_FakeBloodSignReaction_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FakeBloodSignReaction_0.text: So they kept the 'Blood of Lathander' here? No wonder it was looted.

AD_FakeBloodSign_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FakeBloodSign_0.text: *The Blood of Lathander. Spilled in holy battle with Sammaster. Immortalised here for all to worship.*

PAD_CrecheRuins_1.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheRuins_1.text: I must keep focus. A crèche may take any guise - even that of a derelict temple.

PAD_CrecheRuins_2.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheRuins_2.text: Seems odd that the gith set up base in an abandoned monastery.

PAD_CrecheRuins_3.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheRuins_3.text: I did expect a bit more - spectacle, I suppose.

PAD_GithSkeletonComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_GithSkeletonComment_0.text: Only bones and armour left. Must've been part of the original raiding party.

PAD_GithSkeletonComment_1.speaker: Player
PAD_GithSkeletonComment_1.text: Looks like a githyanki, if the armour is anything to go by.
